job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Back End Developer- AI Trainer (Dutch)

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on providing human feedback to train AI models, primarily involving crafting questions and evaluating AI-generated code. It lacks the core responsibilities of building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, which are characteristic of ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code
engaging with these models as they learn to code
Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training and evaluating AI models, specifically focusing on generative AI and code generation, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
The job description explicitly seeks individuals with software engineering and coding expertise, indicating a need for software development skills, even if the primary focus is on training.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: The statement 'no requirement for previous AI experience' implies that the role is open to individuals who can learn and adapt to new AI concepts and tools.

phrases: Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems
soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'discrete, highly variable problems' suggests that the role requires analytical and problem-solving skills to address diverse and potentially complex tasks.
